item.katanamod.soulgem_item.tooltip_line: A stone enhanced by souls trapped inside of it.
item.katanamod.katana_item.tooltip_line_: Hits harder than a sword, though slower and less durable.
item.katanamod.diamond_katana.tooltip.el: Has magical properties of air and sky.
* Gain Speed %s effect while held in hand.
item.katanamod.diamond_katana.ability.sk: * Every %dth attack gain Jump boost %s effect for
%f seconds and throws target and self up %f blocks.
